errors.error_description: The instructions attempt to run the GUI applications before installing their required dependencies, which will cause the commands to fail.
correction_candidates: Move the installation command `python -m pip install scikit-rf[plot,visa]` before the commands to run the apps.
Combine the commands into a single line: `python -m pip install scikit-rf[plot,visa] && data-grabber`.
First, install dependencies with `pip install pyqt5 pyside2`, then run the apps.
errors.golden_answer: Move the installation command `python -m pip install scikit-rf[plot,visa]` before the commands to run the apps.
